title: FR-001 Model management (providers and models)
description:
Centralize provider/model configuration in one settings area with validation and export/import.

Scope:
- Provider CRUD (API keys, endpoints, timeouts)
- Per-provider model list management (name, id, notes, language support)
- Test connection action with clear error reporting
- Export/import provider configurations
acceptance_criteria:
- Providers can be created, edited, deleted, and set as default
- Model lists are editable per provider with display names and capabilities
- Test connection validates auth and endpoint, surfaces errors
- Import/export preserves all provider settings
